notes: Path intersection with near-zero float coordinates (SkBits2Float hex-encoded) works correctly on SkiaSharp 3.119.2 and main — SKPath.Op(Intersect) returns 4 points as expected. The bug was in Skia's native pathops engine bundled with SkiaSharp 1.60.3 (2018); hundreds of pathops fixes have been incorporated since. Reporter's exact version (1.60.3) could not be tested on this environment (macOS arm64, no Rosetta) but the fix is confirmed on all current versions.

reproductionSteps.description: Create standalone console project and add SkiaSharp package reference
reproductionSteps.command: dotnet new console -n Repro --framework net8.0 && cd Repro && dotnet add package SkiaSharp --version 1.60.3
reproductionSteps.output:
The template "Console App" was created successfully.
PackageReference for package 'SkiaSharp' version '1.60.3' added.

filesCreated.description: Reproduction code from issue #655 — constructs two paths with SkBits2Float hex-encoded coordinates and intersects them
Project file targeting net8.0 with SkiaSharp package reference

reproductionSteps.description: Skip running SkiaSharp 1.60.3 — native binary is x86_64 only, no arm64 macOS support, Rosetta unavailable
Update to SkiaSharp 3.119.2 (latest stable) and run repro — intersection returns 4 points correctly
reproductionSteps.command: dotnet add package SkiaSharp --version 3.119.2 && dotnet run

reproductionSteps.description: Test on main (source) — write xUnit test for path op intersection with near-zero coordinates and run against source-built SkiaSharp
reproductionSteps.output: Passed!  - Failed: 0, Passed: 1, Skipped: 0, Total: 1, Duration: < 1 ms - SkiaSharp.Tests.dll (net8.0)

versionResults.notes: NuGet package only contains x86_64 macOS native binary; no arm64 support and Rosetta not available on this machine.
Intersection correctly returns 4 points with correct bounds. Bug is fixed.
Test passes on main — intersection returns non-empty path with correct point count.

triageCorrections.corrected: Confirmed fixed: SKPath.Op(Intersect) returns correct 4-point path on SkiaSharp 3.119.2 and main. Triage was correct.
